DOC.detailed_description: Standard treatment person narrow heart 's coronary artery balloon treatment implantation stent ( Percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) ) . To evaluate disease coronary artery prior , PCI , X-ray fluoroscopy contrast use . X-ray fluoroscopy produce little information disease change vessel wall implanted stent especially polylactid acid ( PLA ) type bioresorbable scaffold visualize poorly . Optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) light-based , high resolution , image modality intra coronary assessment tissue implant . Currently two CE-marked OCT system use clinical practice ( Illumien OPTIS , St. Jude Medical , Minnesota , USA Lunawave , Terumo , Tokyo , Japan ) . It common assumption scan image two system similar interpreted way . The aim study assess tissue , stent PLA type scaffold present characteristic two system . Same segment scan two system systematically compare report . Differences scan two system may implications interpretation thus may affect clinical decision .
